Description: For your consideration: A beautiful Epiphone Les Paul Standard "plain top", cherry sunburst. Includes Roadrunner hardshell case. (guitar will be shipped in case for added security.) I purchased this new, have been the only owner, and this guitar has been well-loved and hasn't left my rehearsal space. (Pickguard was removed and won't be included). What can I say...well, this is just a great example of an Epi Les Paul, nice feel, great playability...it's a cliche but it looks and sounds great. Unfortunately I have money issues and also several other guitars...maybe one is causing the other? But i digress; my loss can be your gain. I'm hoping to find a good home for this, someone who can appreciate a quality guitar. Paypal only and continental USA only please (prompt payment is expected); will ship via UPS ground. Thanks for looking and happy bidding!
Title: Epiphone Les Paul Standard Cherry plaintop with roadrunner hardshell case
ConditionDescription: Gently used, hasn't left rehearsal space
